entry.title: AboutMe
entry.content:
My name is han xu. I am a student of hebei university in China.Is an information security sophomore undergraduate (as of May 2020).
I'm interested in the open source culture of the github community.
In order to record my learning process, I started this blog.
I like to use LeetCode for code practice every day. At present, I mainly study the background development knowledge of Java.
I taught myself basic C++ syntax to learn data structures
I have learned C language and python language in school courses and have a little understanding of js
Currently studying database courses, MySQL is the database environment I am using.
Participated in the small program cloud development evangelist activity held by tencent community, tried to develop a simple serverless WeChat small program.
Currently, I use lenovo Y700P to run win10 for daily learning, but I am interested in the cool and free Linux desktop environment.
I tried to install arch on ubuntu18.04 desktop but failed. Manjaro felt that it was suitable for me, but I finally gave up due to incompatible hardware conditions.
In a word, I have tried a lot of computer technology, but I don't have a deep understanding of it, which is both my weakness and my strength.
I am curious about new technologies and interested in open source culture. I have been involved in programming for less than two years and my technical foundation is still very weak and there is still a long way to go.I look forward to seeing everyone here continue to learn with me and keep exploring and pursuing the future.
This is the first time to write a blog in English. If you have any questions, please forgive me.
Your correction is welcome.
Now I'm learning the springboot framework to develop front and rear split web pages
Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions
My github is @HANXU2018
My Chinese blog site https://hanxu.blog.csdn.net/
email h1076998404@Gmial.com
QQ mailbox can get my reply faster 1076998404@qq.com
thanks
2020/5/7
